# Multi-Agent Cold Email Campaign Generator with O3 Director & GPT-4.1 Specialists

### üåç Overview

This workflow simulates a **virtual sales & marketing team** where each AI agent has a role:

* A **Director Agent (O3)** who manages strategy.
* Multiple **Specialist Agents (GPT-4.1-mini)** for research, writing, personalization, deliverability, sequencing, and analytics.
* Everything is triggered automatically when a new **chat message request** comes in.

---

## üü¢ Section 1: Entry & Director

üîó **Nodes**:
1Ô∏è‚É£ **When chat message received (Trigger)**
üí¨ Starts the workflow when a new request arrives (e.g., *‚ÄúCreate a cold email campaign for SaaS CTOs‚Äù*).

2Ô∏è‚É£ **Outreach Director Agent (O3 model)**
üéØ The ‚Äúmanager‚Äù agent. Decides what kind of campaign is needed and assigns tasks.

3Ô∏è‚É£ **Think (Planning Node)**
üß† Helps the Director structure thoughts before delegating.

üí° **Why useful?**

* Director uses **O3 (strong reasoning model)** only where strategy is needed ‚Üí reduces cost.
* Provides a *single point of control* to coordinate all other agents.

---

## üîµ Section 2: Specialist Agents

Each is powered by **GPT-4.1-mini** (cheaper + faster).

* üîç **Prospect Research Specialist** ‚Üí researches target companies, roles, pain points.
* ‚úçÔ∏è **Cold Email Copywriter** ‚Üí drafts subject lines, hooks, and persuasive body copy.
* üéØ **Personalization Specialist** ‚Üí inserts custom variables for each recipient.
* üìÖ **Email Sequence Strategist** ‚Üí designs follow-ups, timing, nurture flows.
* üì¨ **Email Deliverability Expert** ‚Üí ensures emails land in inbox, not spam.
* üìä **Outreach Analytics Specialist** ‚Üí tracks performance, runs A/B tests, optimizes campaigns.

üí° **Why useful?**

* Each agent is a specialist ‚Üí just like a real marketing team.
* **Parallel execution** in n8n means faster results.
* Modular ‚Üí you can remove or add more specialists.

---

## üü£ Section 3: Execution Flow

1. Request comes in via **chat trigger**
2. Director (O3) interprets and delegates ‚Üí calls specialists as tools
3. Specialists generate their pieces (research ‚Üí copy ‚Üí personalization ‚Üí sequence ‚Üí deliverability ‚Üí analytics)
4. Director integrates results into a **cohesive cold email campaign**

---

## üü° Section 4: Documentation & Notes

There are two **Sticky Notes** inside the workflow:

* **Header Note** ‚Üí Support info + tutorials (YouTube & LinkedIn by Yaron Been)
* **Main Note** ‚Üí Full documentation (overview, use cases, cost optimization, tags)

---

## üìä Final Overview

| Section        | What Happens             | Why It‚Äôs Useful             |
| -------------- | ------------------------ | --------------------------- |
| üü¢ Director    | Trigger + O3 strategy    | Ensures smart coordination  |
| üîµ Specialists | GPT-4.1-mini agents      | Faster, cheaper execution   |
| üü£ Flow        | Delegation + Integration | Automated campaign building |
| üü° Docs        | Sticky Notes             | In-workflow guide for users |

---

## üöÄ Benefits

* ‚úÖ **AI-powered cold email team** without hiring humans
* ‚úÖ **Cost-optimized** (O3 only for strategy, GPT-4.1-mini for tasks ‚Üí \~90% cheaper)
* ‚úÖ **End-to-end coverage** (research ‚Üí writing ‚Üí personalization ‚Üí sequencing ‚Üí analytics)
* ‚úÖ **Scalable**: can run multiple campaigns in parallel
* ‚úÖ **Customizable**: swap models, add tools, or expand team

---
